text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a DX

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    DXObservationDiagnosisTypesIncludes all codes defining types of indications such as diagnosis, symptom and other indications such as contrast agents for lab tests.

name: ObservationDiagnosisTypes
title: ObservationDiagnosisTypes
description: An observation about the presence (or absence) of a particular disease state in a subject.
